name: Elevated Car Crash Driver 2020
description:
Time to enjoy futuristic concept elevated car driving to revolutionize the high traffic. Operate elevated car parking with soft controls & enjoy the winning point of driving. Just follow the traffic rules & learn how to operate elevated car. Select customize cars and be the ultimate crash driver.

In big city there is heavy traffic problems but now with elevated car parking mod you can control it. Enjoy crazy elevated car driving with crash. Before this you have played many crash games. But now enjoy crash in heavy traffic with high jump ramps. Remember! You can drive everywhere but avoid to restricted areas and opposite lane in this elevated car parking & crash accident simulator.

Download this futuristic car crash with elevated adventure and relish yourself with new game 2020. Enjoy unique levels of car driving with high jumps stunts on busy road.

Features:

Enjoy high speed car driving
Be a futuristic elevated car driver
Realistic city locations and sky high
Challenging revolutionize elevated car driver
